name: tm45
effect: Teaches Attract to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Attract to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Thunder Wave)

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
flavor_text.platinum: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
